markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impose Order (Psychic)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3680) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Psyche" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=429" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 27</row>

**Prerequisites**
[precise discipline](/SubconsciousMinds.aspx?ID=3) subconscious mind

**Requirements**
[precise discipline](/SubconsciousMinds.aspx?ID=3) subconscious mind

</column>

---

You bring discipline to your mind and magic, ensuring that you don't under-perform. Until the end of your turn, instead of rolling dice for damage, count each damage die as average damage rounded up (3 for d4, 4 for d6, 5 for d8, 6 for d10, and 7 for d12).
name: Impose Order (Psychic)
